name: key-count
description: A simple module for keeping collections of keyed integers that can be incremented/decremented and observed.

scripts.build:umd: $(npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/keyCount.js
scripts.build:umd:min: $(npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production $(npm bin)/webpack src/index.js dist/keyCount.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Simon Fletcher <simon@wakecodesleep.com> (http://wakecodesleep.com)
